name: Pablo Honey
bio: Pablo Honey is the debut studio album by English rock band Radiohead, released on 22 February 1993 by Parlophone in the United Kingdom and by Capitol Records in the United States.

name: The Bends
bio: The Bends is the second studio album by English rock band Radiohead, released on 13 March 1995 by Parlophone in the United Kingdom and Capitol Records in the United States

name: OK Computer
bio: OK Computer is the third studio album by English rock band Radiohead, released on 16 June 1997 on EMI subsidiaries Parlophone and Capitol Records

name: Kid A
bio: Kid A is the fourth studio album by the English rock band Radiohead, released on 2 October 2000 by Parlophone.

name: Amnesiac
bio: Amnesiac is the fifth studio album by the English rock band Radiohead, released in June 2001 by Parlophone.

name: Hail To The Thief
bio: Hail to the Thief is the sixth studio album by English rock band Radiohead, released on 9 June 2003 by Parlophone in the UK and a day later by Capitol Records in the United States.

name: In Rainbows
bio: In Rainbows is the seventh studio album by English rock band Radiohead, self-released on 10 October 2007 as a pay-what-you-want download.

name: King of Limbs
bio: The King of Limbs is the eighth studio album by English rock band Radiohead, self-released on 18 February 2011 as a download in MP3 and WAV formats.

name: Moon Shaped Pool
bio: A Moon Shaped Pool is the ninth studio album by the English rock band Radiohead. It was released digitally on 8 May 2016, with CD and LP releases in June 2016 through XL Recordings.
